vulnerability.name: USN-4451-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4451-1 fixed a vulnerability in ppp. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Thomas Chauchefoin working with Trend Micro´s Zero Day Initiative,   discovered that ppp incorrectly handled module loading. A local attacker  could use this issue to load arbitrary kernel modules and possibly execute   arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: ppp could be made to load arbitrary kernel modules and possibly run programs. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
